'''Flourishing Bloom''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It is obtained during the [[Hues of the Violet Garden/The Floral Courtyard|The Floral Courtyard]] part of the [[Hues of the Violet Garden]] event.
